eligibility.notes: In-app + 7-ELEVEN COD; opened ~62h after pickup; Order is not yet completed

snadResult.label: SNAD
snadResult.reason: The decision is based on policy rules; no material mismatch was identified.

primaryOption.label: Return & Full Refund
primaryOption.details: Seller reimburses NT$60 COD shipping and provides a return label.

alternativeOption.label: Partial Refund & Keep Item
alternativeOption.details: Buyer keeps the item; offer 15–30% partial refund.

caseSummary:

Eligibility: R1/R2/R3 ✅
Key: The decision is based on policy rules; no material mismatch was identified.

Outcome: Both parties reached an agreement to refund the buyer a partial amount of NT$500 as goodwill.
